original: @473b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @473b rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya t'a ra aashta gho re t'a sb'i s'u tra /
analyzed: a'arya t'a ra aashta gho re t'a sb'i s'u tra /
translated: Arya-Tara-Ashta-Ghoreta-Savitri

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo /🔽dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The Sutra of Noble Tara, the Protector from the Eight Fears🔽Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Venerable Tara!

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal @474a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal @474a *//
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, Shakyamuni!

original: lo; ;'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: lo; ;'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time:

original: bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi steng lho'i gnas na bzhugs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi steng lho'i gnas na bzhugs te /
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling on the summit of Mount Meru in the southern abode,

original: de nyid du 'khor rnams kyi nang nas lha mo sgrol mas 'di skad ces smras so; ;mtho ris rin chen lta bu 'di thob nas //
analyzed: de nyid du 'khor rnams kyi nang nas lha mo sgrol mas 'di skad ces smras so; ;mtho ris rin chen lta bu 'di thob nas //
translated: and from within that very retinue, the goddess Tara spoke thus: Having attained this jewel-like high rebirth,

original: las dang las kyi 'bras bu shes par byos //
analyzed: las dang las kyi 'bras bu shes par byos //
translated: understand the fruits of karma and non-karma.

original: bzang po sten cing ngan pa spang bar gyis //
analyzed: bzang po sten cing ngan pa spang bar gyis //
translated: Rely on the good and abandon the bad.

original: gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams spyod byed pa //
analyzed: gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams spyod byed pa //
translated: Those who engage in negative actions

original: 'jig rten pha rol thur du 'bab 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol thur du 'bab 'gyur te //
translated: will fall downward to the next world.

original: dud 'gro glen lkugs gcig la gcig za dang // gyen thur 'bab 'dzeg g-yang sa ngal ba'i lam //
analyzed: dud 'gro glen lkugs gcig la gcig za dang // gyen thur 'bab 'dzeg g-yang sa ngal ba'i lam //
translated: going up and down, on paths of hardship and danger.

original: 'jigs shing dngangs skrag shin tu skyi g-ya' ba //
analyzed: 'jigs shing dngangs skrag shin tu skyi g-ya' ba //
translated: Terrified, frightened, and terrified, they are utterly hair-raising.

original: zon dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: zon dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
translated: The suffering of being on guard is inconceivable.

original: yi dvags ltogs shing skom dang lus mi 'tsham //
analyzed: yi dvags ltogs shing skom dang lus mi 'tsham //
translated: Hungry ghosts are hungry and thirsty, their bodies out of proportion,🔽with food and drink appearing, but guarded by others,

original: bza' btung snang yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang // kha cig zos kyang me dang mtshon du 'gyur //
analyzed: bza' btung snang yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang // kha cig zos kyang me dang mtshon du 'gyur //
translated: and some, even when eaten, turn into fire and weapons.

original: ltogs shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: ltogs shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
translated: The suffering of hunger and thirst is inconceivable.

original: dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni //
analyzed: dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni //
translated: Those sentient beings born in the hells

original: rang dbang med par gshin rje gdug pas khrid //
analyzed: rang dbang med par gshin rje gdug pas khrid //
translated: are led by the evil Yama without their own control.

original: bsregs shing btsos te mtshon gyis rab tu 'thug /
analyzed: bsregs shing btsos te mtshon gyis rab tu 'thug /
translated: They are burned, boiled, and cut with weapons,

original: bsran glags med pa'i sdug bsngal tsha dang grang //
analyzed: bsran glags med pa'i sdug bsngal tsha dang grang //
translated: with unbearable suffering, hot and cold.

original: des na tshe 'dir sdig pa'i las byed pa //
analyzed: des na tshe 'dir sdig pa'i las byed pa //
translated: Therefore, those who commit evil deeds in this life

original: rang gis rang la mngan ni cher byas yin //
analyzed: rang gis rang la mngan ni cher byas yin //
translated: have greatly deceived themselves.

original: bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs //
analyzed: bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs //
translated: For many eons, they are tormented by intense suffering.

original: thar pa'i dus med bsran pa'i glags kyang med //
analyzed: thar pa'i dus med bsran pa'i glags kyang med //
translated: There is no time for liberation, and no chance for endurance.

original: dran pa gsal @474b bas las kyi 'bras bur shes //
analyzed: dran pa gsal @474b bas las kyi 'bras bur shes //
translated: With clear memory, one knows the results of karma.

original: sdug bsngal ma bzong smre sngags rang la rmo //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ma bzong smre sngags rang la rmo //
translated: Without enduring suffering, one laments to oneself.

original: skad ngan drag po'i ku sgras gzhan yang skrag /
analyzed: skad ngan drag po'i ku sgras gzhan yang skrag /
translated: The loud sounds of wailing frighten others.

original: de la sogs te sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: de la sogs te sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
translated: These and other sufferings are inconceivable.

original: gang dag nyes dmigs rab tu shes gyis la //
analyzed: gang dag nyes dmigs rab tu shes gyis la //
translated: Those who understand the faults

original: ngan song gsum gyi rgyu rnams rab tu spangs //
analyzed: ngan song gsum gyi rgyu rnams rab tu spangs //
translated: Should completely abandon the causes of the three lower realms.

original: sdig pa'i rnam pa phra rags gang la yang //
analyzed: sdig pa'i rnam pa phra rags gang la yang //
translated: No matter how subtle or coarse the aspects of negativity,

original: lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas spyad ta re //
analyzed: lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas spyad ta re //
translated: Do not engage in them through body, speech, or mind.

original: rang yang bde la 'gro rnams yongs la phan //
analyzed: rang yang bde la 'gro rnams yongs la phan //
translated: Be happy yourself and benefit all beings.

original: chags sdang rmongs spangs snying rje'i rtsa ba brtan //
analyzed: chags sdang rmongs spangs snying rje'i rtsa ba brtan //
translated: Abandon attachment, aversion, and ignorance, and stabilize the root of compassion.

original: sgo gsum dang bas 'bad de dge ba spyad //
analyzed: sgo gsum dang bas 'bad de dge ba spyad //
translated: With devotion, strive to engage in virtue with the three doors.

original: shin tu zab pa'i snying po 'di la 'bad //🔽me tog sad kyis khyer ba'i 'bras bu la //
analyzed: shin tu zab pa'i snying po 'di la 'bad // me tog sad kyis khyer ba'i 'bras bu la //
translated: Strive in this extremely profound essence.

original: so nam byas kyang myu gu mi skye ltar //
analyzed: so nam byas kyang myu gu mi skye ltar //
translated: Just as a crop will not grow from fruit that has been damaged by frost,

original: sdom nyams the tshom zos pa'i gang zag gis //
analyzed: sdom nyams the tshom zos pa'i gang zag gis //
translated: A person who has broken his vows and has doubts

original: shin tu zab pa'i rig sngags bsgrub gyur kyang //
analyzed: shin tu zab pa'i rig sngags bsgrub gyur kyang //
translated: May practice the most profound knowledge mantra,

original: byin brlabs 'byung ngo snyam yang 'byung mi srid //
analyzed: byin brlabs 'byung ngo snyam yang 'byung mi srid //
translated: But even if he thinks there will be blessings, it is impossible.

original: rtsol ba de dag nga la ba don med 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsol ba de dag nga la ba don med 'gyur //
translated: Such effort is meaningless for me.

original: rig sngags de yang skye bo'i tshig dang mtshungs //
analyzed: rig sngags de yang skye bo'i tshig dang mtshungs //
translated: That knowledge mantra is also like the words of a person,

original: ting 'dzin rnams kyang byis pa'i bsam pa 'dra //
analyzed: ting 'dzin rnams kyang byis pa'i bsam pa 'dra //
translated: And the samadhis are like the thoughts of a child.

original: skyon med skyes bus rig sngags de bsgrubs na //
analyzed: skyon med skyes bus rig sngags de bsgrubs na //
translated: If a person without faults practices that knowledge mantra,

original: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du myur du 'grub //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du myur du 'grub //
translated: It will be accomplished quickly, just as desired.

original: dper na n+ya gro dha yi sa bon ni //
analyzed: dper na n+ya gro dha yi sa bon ni //
translated: For example, the seed of a banyan tree

original: shin tu phra yang chu lud legs bran na //
analyzed: shin tu phra yang chu lud legs bran na //
translated: Is very small, but if well watered and manured,

original: dgung zla bdun na dpag tshad tsam du skye //
analyzed: dgung zla bdun na dpag tshad tsam du skye //
translated: In seven days it will grow to the size of a yojana.

original: bems po phyi yi 'gyur yang de 'dra na //
analyzed: bems po phyi yi 'gyur yang de 'dra na //
translated: If the external transformation of an inanimate object is like that,

original: rig pas rig pa bsgrub pa lta ci smos //
analyzed: rig pas rig pa bsgrub pa lta ci smos //
translated: What need is there to mention the practice of knowledge by knowledge?

original: 'od gsal nang gi 'gyur la dpag tu med //
analyzed: 'od gsal nang gi 'gyur la dpag tu med //
translated: The internal transformation of luminosity is immeasurable.

original: tshong dpon lam la mkhas pa dag la brten //
analyzed: tshong dpon lam la mkhas pa dag la brten //
translated: Rely on the skilled merchants who are experts in the path.

original: gru @475a *// tshags legs pas rgya mtshor zhugs gyur na //
analyzed: gru @475a *// tshags legs pas rgya mtshor zhugs gyur na //
translated: If one sets out on the ocean with a well-equipped ship,

original: rin chen 'dod pa bzhin du rnyed gyur nas //
analyzed: rin chen 'dod pa bzhin du rnyed gyur nas //
translated: one will find the jewels as one wishes,

original: rang gi gnas su legs par phyin pa yin //
analyzed: rang gi gnas su legs par phyin pa yin //
translated: and will safely return to one’s own country.

original: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms rten //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms rten //
translated: Relying on love, compassion, joy, and equanimity,

original: byang chub sems ldan dge ba spyad gyur na //
analyzed: byang chub sems ldan dge ba spyad gyur na //
translated: if one who possesses bodhicitta practices virtue,

original: yang dag rdzogs kyi lam la zhugs 'gyur te //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs kyi lam la zhugs 'gyur te //
translated: one will set out on the path of perfect completion

original: nges par mkhyen nyid sa la 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nges par mkhyen nyid sa la 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: and will certainly proceed to the stage of omniscience.

original: mda' nyid skyes bu'i 'theb nas shor gyur na //
analyzed: mda' nyid skyes bu'i 'theb nas shor gyur na //
translated: If an arrow is released from the archer’s bow,

original: mi 'phang snyam yang shin tu 'phangs par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi 'phang snyam yang shin tu 'phangs par 'gyur //
translated: even if one thinks it will not go far, it will go very far.

original: chos nyid don kun chub pa'i gang zag ni //
analyzed: chos nyid don kun chub pa'i gang zag ni //
translated: A person who has realized the meaning of dharmatā

original: mi phyin snyam yang pha rol phyin par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi phyin snyam yang pha rol phyin par 'gyur //
translated: will reach the other side even if he thinks he will not get there.

original: bya cha'i rnam pa rang bzhin rdzogs gyur nas //
analyzed: bya cha'i rnam pa rang bzhin rdzogs gyur nas //
translated: If the various aspects of the Dharma are naturally perfected,

original: sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par the tshom med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt that one will attain the result of buddhahood.

original: chos nyid rnam par dag pa de rtogs na //
analyzed: chos nyid rnam par dag pa de rtogs na //
translated: If one realizes that dharmatā is pure,

original: bdag med srog med srog kyang gcad du med //
analyzed: bdag med srog med srog kyang gcad du med //
translated: there is no self, no life, and no life to be cut.

original: las med de yi rnam par smin pa med //
analyzed: las med de yi rnam par smin pa med //
translated: There is no karma and no ripening of karma.

original: mtha' rnams rab spangs skyes bu rnam par grol //
analyzed: mtha' rnams rab spangs skyes bu rnam par grol //
translated: Abandoning extremes, the person is liberated.

original: de don rtogs phyir bdag gis bshad pa yi //
analyzed: de don rtogs phyir bdag gis bshad pa yi //
translated: In order to realize that meaning, I have explained🔽This essence.

original: snying po 'di la gus pas bzlas gyur na //
analyzed: snying po 'di la gus pas bzlas gyur na //
translated: If you recite it with devotion,

original: bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi sdig kyang 'dzad //
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi sdig kyang 'dzad //
translated: The negativities of three incalculable eons will be exhausted.

original: ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun //
analyzed: ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun //
translated: All the sufferings of the three lower realms and saṃsāra

original: rab tu sbyong zhing sgrib pa rnams kyang 'dag /
analyzed: rab tu sbyong zhing sgrib pa rnams kyang 'dag /
translated: Will be purified and obscurations will be purified.

original: don dang ldan pa'i snying po 'di lta ste //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i snying po 'di lta ste //
translated: The meaningful essence is as follows:

original: aom byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo /
analyzed: aom byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo /
translated: Oṃ, bodhisattva, great being,

original: lha mo khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol //
analyzed: lha mo khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol //
translated: Goddess, please protect me!

original: aom na mo a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
analyzed: aom na mo a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
translated: Oṃ, homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara,

original: bo dhi satv'a ya /
analyzed: bo dhi satv'a ya /
translated: The bodhisattva,

original: ma h'a satv'a ya /
analyzed: ma h'a satv'a ya /
translated: The great being,

original: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a @475b ma; tadya th'a /🔽aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dusht'an /
analyzed: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a @475b ma; tadya th'a / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dusht'an /
translated: The great compassionate one.🔽Tadyathā:🔽Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture,

original: pra dusht'an ma ma kri te /🔽dzambha ya / stambha ya /
analyzed: pra dusht'an ma ma kri te / dzambha ya / stambha ya /
translated: To all the wicked and very wicked,🔽To all that I have done,

original: mo ha ya /🔽ban dha ya /
analyzed: mo ha ya /🔽ban dha ya /
translated: To all that I have caused to be done,🔽To all that I have rejoiced in,

original: h'um h'um h'um/ phat phat phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: h'um h'um h'um/ phat phat phat sv'ah'a /
translated: PHAT PHAT PHAT SVAHĀ

original: ma ma a'ary'a ba lo bha y'a na r'a /
analyzed: ma ma a'ary'a ba lo bha y'a na r'a /
translated: MĀM ĀRYĀVALOKITEŚVARA

original: bo dhi satv'a /
analyzed: bo dhi satv'a /
translated: BODHISATTVA

original: ma h'a satv'a ni /
analyzed: ma h'a satv'a ni /
translated: MAHĀSATTVA

original: aa dhishth'a na /
analyzed: aa dhishth'a na /
translated: ADHĪŚANA

original: aa dhishthi te ma ma sarba karma a'a ba ra na sva bh'a ba /
analyzed: aa dhishthi te ma ma sarba karma a'a ba ra na sva bh'a ba /
translated: ADHĪṢṬHITE MĀM SARVA KARMA AVARANA SVABHĀVA

original: shud dhe bi shud dhe /
analyzed: shud dhe bi shud dhe /
translated: ŚUDDHE VIŚUDDHE

original: sho dha ya bi sho dha ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sho dha ya bi sho dha ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: ŚODHAYA VIŚODHAYA HUM PHAT SVĀHĀ

original: de nas sangs rgyas nyid kyis su //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas nyid kyis su //
translated: Then the Buddha himself

original: lha mo nyid la rab tu bstod //
analyzed: lha mo nyid la rab tu bstod //
translated: Praised the goddess herself:

original: thugs rje shin tu che bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma //
analyzed: thugs rje shin tu che bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma //
translated: You who act for the benefit of beings with great compassion,

original: mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs shing rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs shing rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
translated: Complete with major and minor marks, adorned with jeweled ornaments,

original: shin tu mdzes tshul 'dzum zhing bzhad pa'i bzhin //
analyzed: shin tu mdzes tshul 'dzum zhing bzhad pa'i bzhin //
translated: With a very beautiful smile on your face,🔽Your eye faculty is like a jasmine flower,

original: spyan gyi skye mched zar ma'i padma 'dra; ;snyan gyi skye mched aug cos bye ba 'dra //
analyzed: spyan gyi skye mched zar ma'i padma 'dra; ;snyan gyi skye mched aug cos bye ba 'dra //
translated: Your ear faculty is like a hundred thousand trumpets,

original: shangs kyi skye mched autpal bum bu 'dra //
analyzed: shangs kyi skye mched autpal bum bu 'dra //
translated: Your nose faculty is like an utpala vase,

original: zhal gyi skye mched ha lo rgyas pa 'dra //
analyzed: zhal gyi skye mched ha lo rgyas pa 'dra //
translated: Your mouth faculty is like a blooming lotus,

original: sna tshogs sku mnga' na chung mtshan ldan sku //
analyzed: sna tshogs sku mnga' na chung mtshan ldan sku //
translated: You have a youthful body with various marks.

original: chos kyi sgra sgrogs ka la ping ka'i gsung //
analyzed: chos kyi sgra sgrogs ka la ping ka'i gsung //
translated: Your voice is like the kalaviṅka bird, proclaiming the sound of Dharma.

original: sems can kun la byams mgon thugs rje'i thugs //
analyzed: sems can kun la byams mgon thugs rje'i thugs //
translated: You have a compassionate mind, a protector of love for all beings.

original: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos padma g-yon //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos padma g-yon //
translated: You are unstained by the faults of saṃsāra, a lotus in your left hand.

original: sems can don rnams mdzad phyir skyabs sbyin g-yas //
analyzed: sems can don rnams mdzad phyir skyabs sbyin g-yas //
translated: You grant refuge in your right hand, to accomplish the welfare of beings.

original: thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: You sit on a seat of sun and moon, method and wisdom.

original: rje btsun sgrol ma la ni skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: rje btsun sgrol ma la ni skyabs su mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to the Venerable Tārā.

original: 'khor ba'i g-yang sa che las bdag skyobs shig /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i g-yang sa che las bdag skyobs shig /
translated: Protect me from the great abyss of saṃsāra.

original: 'gro drug rang kha'i gnas su 'khor ra re //
analyzed: 'gro drug rang kha'i gnas su 'khor ra re //
translated: I will wander in the abodes of the six beings.

original: thugs rje chen mo'i zhags pas bdag zung shig /
analyzed: thugs rje chen mo'i zhags pas bdag zung shig /
translated: Bind me with the noose of great compassion.

original: ngan song gsum gyi gnas su shor ra re //
analyzed: ngan song gsum gyi gnas su shor ra re //
translated: I will fall into the realms of the three lower realms.

original: 'khyams med pa yi lam du bdag chug shig /
analyzed: 'khyams med pa yi lam du bdag chug shig /
translated: Place me on the path that is without wandering.

original: log par lta ba'i rigs su skyes sa re //🔽bla ma byang sems @476a *//
analyzed: log par lta ba'i rigs su skyes sa re // bla ma byang sems @476a *//
translated: I will be born in a family with wrong views.

original: mnga' dang bdag sprod cig /
analyzed: mnga' dang bdag sprod cig /
translated: Give me the empowerment of the guru bodhisattvas.

original: bshes gnyen ngan pa dag dang phrad ta re'o //
analyzed: bshes gnyen ngan pa dag dang phrad ta re'o //
translated: I will meet with bad friends.

original: seng ge glang chen me dang sbrul //
analyzed: seng ge glang chen me dang sbrul //
translated: Lions, elephants, fire, and snakes,

original: mi rgod chu dang rims rnams dang // sha zas 'jigs pa brgyad po las //
analyzed: mi rgod chu dang rims rnams dang // sha zas 'jigs pa brgyad po las //
translated: and from the flesh-eaters,

original: skyob mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: skyob mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, the protector.

original: 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu //
translated: In this world and the next,

original: 'jigs pa brgyad las bskyab tu gsol //
analyzed: 'jigs pa brgyad las bskyab tu gsol //
translated: please protect me from the eight fears.

original: pha rol 'bras bu ma thob par dag tu //
analyzed: pha rol 'bras bu ma thob par dag tu //
translated: Until I attain the other shore,🔽may I never be separated from the ten perfections:🔽generosity, discipline, patience, diligence,🔽concentration, wisdom, skillful means, aspiration,

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam dang // stobs dang de bzhin ye shes pha rol phyin //🔽bcu po de dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam dang // stobs dang de bzhin ye shes pha rol phyin // bcu po de dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /
translated: strength, and likewise, the perfection of wisdom.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos 'di bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha tog dang / kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos 'di bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha tog dang / kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
translated: Whoever, son or daughter of good family, writes, reads, recites, masters, properly pays attention to, and teaches this Dharma extensively to others, should do so.

original: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te mngon par bstod do //
translated: The entire assembly rejoiced and praised it.

original: rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo rdzogs so ////
translated: The Sūtra of Tārā, the Noble Lady, Who Protects from the Eight Fears is complete.
